frame.name: Accomplishment
frame.definition:
<def-root>After a period in which the <fen>Agent</fen> has been working on a <fen>Goal</fen>, the <fen>Agent</fen> manages to attain it. The <fen>Goal</fen> may be a desired state, or be conceptualized as an event. <ex></ex> <ex><fex name="Agent">Jeremey</fex> <fex name="Manner">obediently</fex> <t>accomplished</t> <fex name="Goal">this task</fex>.</ex>
<ex>In response, the Prime Minister has simply cited <fex name="Agent">his</fex> <fex name="Domain">free-market</fex> <t><fex name="Goal">accomplishments</fex></t>. </ex> </def-root>

FE.name: Means
FE.definition:
<def-root>An intentional action performed by the <fen>Agent</fen> that lets them accomplish their <fen>Goal</fen>.
<ex>Can you , too , <t>achieve</t> omniscience <fex name="Mns">by calling on the power of God</fex> ?</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Agent
FE.definition: <def-root>The conscious entity, generally a person, that performs the intentional act that fulfills the <fen>Goal</fen>.</def-root>

FE.name: Instrument
FE.definition:
<def-root>An entity directed by the <fen>Agent</fen> that allows them to achieve their <fen>Goal</fen>.
<ex><fex name="Ins">With a simple hammer and saw</fex> , you can <t>accomplish</t> almost anything !</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Place
FE.definition:
<def-root>This FE identifies the place where the <fen>Agent</fen> achieves their <fen>Goal</fen>.
<ex>She had already <t>achieved</t> that feat <fex name="Place">in Burma</fex> .</ex> </def-root>

FE.name: Time
FE.definition:
<def-root>This FE identifies the time when the <fen>Agent</fen> achieves their <fen>Goal</fen>.
<ex><fex name="Time">By 1700</fex> , our forces will have <t>achieved</t> total victory .</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Manner
FE.definition:
<def-root>Any description of the event which is not covered by more specific FEs, including secondary effects (quietly, loudly), and general descriptions comparing events (the same way). It may also indicate salient characteristics of the <fen>Agent</fen> that also affect the action (presumptuously, coldly, deliberately, eagerly, carefully).
<ex>Perhaps you <t>achieved</t> perfection <fex name="man">too quickly</fex> .</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Explanation
FE.definition:
<def-root>A state-of-affairs from which the accomplishment would be predicted.
<ex>Yes, he was humble, but he <t>achieved</t> enlightenment <fex name="exp">only because he came from the upper class</fex>.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Degree
FE.definition:
<def-root>The extent to which the <fen>Agent</fen> achieves the <fen>Goal</fen>.
<ex>He has only <fex name="Degr">partially</fex> <t>achieved</t> his objective .</ex>
</def-root>

FE.name: Goal
FE.definition:
<def-root>The state or action that the <fen>Agent</fen> has wished to participate in.
<ex>Iraq had <t>achieved</t> <fex name="goa">its programme objective of producing nuclear weapons</fex> . </ex></def-root>

FE.name: Outcome
FE.definition: <def-root>The <fen>Outcome</fen> is the failure or success of accomplishing a <fen>Goal</fen>.</def-root>

FE.name: Circumstances
FE.definition: <def-root>Some specification of the circumstances under which <fen>Goal</fen> is accomplished.</def-root>

FE.name: Duration
FE.definition: <def-root>The length of time that it takes for <fen>Goal</fen> to be accomplished. </def-root>

FE.name: Domain
FE.definition:
<def-root>The particular aspect or domain of the <fen>Goal</fen> that is achieved.
<ex>No one can surpass his <fex name="dom">economic and financial</fex> <t>achievements</t>.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Particular_iteration
FE.definition: <def-root>Expressions marked with this extra-thematic FE modify a non-iterative use of the target, and indicate that it is conceived as embedded within an iterated series of similar events or states. </def-root>
